c1.name: Dew-Drinker
c1.descriptionRaw:
Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrows or Frostflake Arrow Blooms decrease opponents' <color=#99FFFFFF>Cryo RES</color> by 15% for 6s upon hit.
A hit also regenerates 2 Energy for Ganyu. This effect can only occur once per Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow, regardless if Frostflake Arrow itself or its Bloom hits the target.
c1.description:
Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrows or Frostflake Arrow Blooms decrease opponents' Cryo RES by 15% for 6s upon hit.
A hit also regenerates 2 Energy for Ganyu. This effect can only occur once per Charge Level 2 Frostflake Arrow, regardless if Frostflake Arrow itself or its Bloom hits the target.

c2.name: The Auspicious
c2.descriptionRaw: <color=#FFD780FF>Trail of the Qilin</color> gains 1 additional charge.
c2.description: Trail of the Qilin gains 1 additional charge.

c3.name: Cloud-Strider
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Celestial Shower</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Celestial Shower by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Westward Sojourn
c4.descriptionRaw:
Opponents standing within the AoE of <color=#FFD780FF>Celestial Shower</color> take increased DMG. This effect strengthens over time.
Increased DMG taken begins at 5% and increases by 5% every 3s, up to a maximum of 25%.
The effect lingers for 3s after the opponent leaves the AoE.
c4.description:

c5.name: The Merciful
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Trail of the Qilin</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Trail of the Qilin by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: The Clement
c6.descriptionRaw: Using <color=#FFD780FF>Trail of the Qilin</color> causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.
c6.description: Using Trail of the Qilin causes the next Frostflake Arrow shot within 30s to not require charging.
